name: py-spatialite
description:
Wrapper for standard Python module "sqlite3" which adds SpatiaLite
support.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: libspatialite
dependencies.description:
SpatiaLite is an open source library intended to extend the SQLite core
to support fully fledged Spatial SQL capabilities.
